p: SLEV RNA has been detected in Brazil; during a large dengue outbreak in 2006, 54 serum samples that were negative for DENV and Yellow fever virus were analysed and SLEV was found in three samples from paediatric patients, and all had diagnoses of viral meningoencephalitis. In two of these children viral RNA was found in the CSF, but in one of them only in the patient's serum [32].
